participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Sociable and competitive, enjoys challenges and embraces new experiences.
participant_1.background: i like to spend my money on cars. i have never had a steady relationship. i watch too much tv in spare time. i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i work from home.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Calm and introspective, values solitude and enjoys quiet activities.
participant_2.background: i am single and with two dogs. i do not drink alcohol. i like to play chess. i'm in my thirties. i love taking bubble baths.

content.text: i also like to play chess
